casebody.data:
John Brooks Leavitt, Respondent, v. Lewis S. Chase, Appellant. Decided June 23, 1887. Appeal.from order granting motion for reference. Abram Kling, for appellant. Austen G. Fox, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J.,. Freedman and Truax, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs.
